TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordDeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

Docs.summary: Derives a key from a password using an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個類別會使用 PBKDF1 演算法 PKCS #5 v2.0 標準中所定義的延伸模組，從密碼衍生適用於作為金鑰內容的位元組。 標準演算法記載於 IETF RRC 2898。
> [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰從密碼使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes>類別。
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: The password to derive the key for.
The key salt to use to derive the key.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying the password and key salt to use to derive the key.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] CryptDeriveKey (string algname, string alghashname, int keySize, byte[] rgbIV);

Docs.param: The algorithm name for which to derive the key.
The hash algorithm name to use to derive the key.

Docs.summary: Derives a cryptographic key from the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此函式是 Crypto API 函式 CryptDeriveKey()，包裝函式，要提供與使用 Crypto API 的應用程式的互通性。
如果`keySize`參數設為 0 位元，使用指定的演算法的預設金鑰大小。
## Examples 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes>類別。
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#2)]

Docs.exception: The parameter is incorrect. -or- The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired. -or- The parameter is not a valid algorithm name. -or- The parameter is not a valid hash algorithm name.

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。 `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。
`disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PasswordDeriveBytes> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

block.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Rfc2898DeriveBytes replaces PasswordDeriveBytes for deriving key material from a password and is preferred in new applications.")

Docs.param: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.
Docs.returns: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以建立任意數目的虛擬隨機位元組。 不過，位元組序列的強度會受到雜湊輸出中的位元組數目。

member this.Salt : byte[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.
Docs.value: 用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典攻擊是攻擊者嘗試藉由比較最可能的索引鍵的先前計算的加密值的加密的值解密加密的訊息。 這種攻擊會導入的密碼，才能進行金鑰衍生結尾的隨機位元組更為困難。 這些隨機位元組稱為 salt。

Docs.exception: The key salt value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
